籤詩版本二:
Musanganiswa wehove neshato unechirevo chimwe chete.Gara mudziva rakadzika womirira mhanza.
Asingazivi, Yumen akasvetuka pamusoro peDragon Palace akasimudza musoro.
詩意:
Hexagram hove uye dhiragoni zvinoramba zvisina kuchinjwa.
Zvose zvinouya nenguva.
解曰: Kunyangwe iri Ziji. Uyewo mirira. Ronga bhizinesi rako wega. Usaite zvisina tsarukano.
籤詩故事一:
◇Hongu vachiona mombe
Zhu Yuanzhang, chizvarwa chekuZhongli, Haozhou (yava kunzi Fengyang County, mudunhu reAnhui), akaberekwa mugore rekutanga raTianli weYuan Wenzong weYuan Dynasty, ari wechina mumhuri yake. Akazvarwa mumhuri yevarombo.Nekuda kwehurombo achiri mudiki, haana kuzokwanisa kudzidza uye akambofudzira muridzi wemba mombe.
Mugore rechina raZhizheng (1344), kwakava nekusanaya kwemvura kwakaipisisa muHuaibei. Baba, amai, nemukoma waZhu Yuanzhang vakafa zvakatevedzana, saka akanga asina imwe sarudzo kunze kwekuve mumongi mutsva muHuangjue Temple.
Pasati papera mwedzi miviri vapinda mutemberi, nokuda kwedambudziko rokuunganidza rendi yetemberi mumakore enzara, muridzi wetemberi akavhara dura ndokudzinga mamongi.Zhu Yuanzhang aifanira kusiya taundi rokumusha kwake ndokuva mumongi anodzungaira (a) mumongi airarama nekupemha).
Gare gare, Zhu Yuanzhang akazove Taizu weMing Dynasty uye "mambo wevagari" munhoroondo yeChinese, aine zita rekutonga "Hongwu".
(Dimikira rerungano urwu nderokuti kuva munhuwo zvake kwekanguva hazvirevi kuti zvichangofanana mune ramangwana. Izvi zvinodaro nekuti nguva haisati yasvika.)
聖意: Mhuri yakachengeteka, mhuri ine hutano, rombo rakanaka, bhizinesi rakamirira, muchato wanonoka, mukono unozvarirwa muLiujia, mufambi anonoka, gonye resadza ranonoka, gonye resadza rakawanda, mhuka nhanhatu. vakaregwa miswe, munhu akashaikwa, hapana mhosva inonokerwa, kutama kunochengetedza, pfuma yakarasika inotadziswa nechirwere, guva regomo
